AboutMe.title: About Me
AboutMe.p1: I am a passionate <strong1>Software Engineer</strong1> graduated from UNICEN with experience building scalable solutions. While my expertise spans both front-end and back-end development, I have a strong passion for <strong2>mobile development</strong2>, creating seamless and user-friendly applications.
AboutMe.p2: I have solid experience with technologies like React, React Native, JavaScript, TypeScript, Java, Spring Boot, Python, and AWS, enabling me to design <strong3>secure and scalable applications</strong3>.
AboutMe.p3: I enjoy solving complex problems by designing simple, effective solutions and thrive in collaborative environments where I can teach and learn from others.
